post:
Affordable Cloud Hosting For Everyone!
--------------------------------------



From QuadexHosting we'd like to show off some of our super affordable Cloud VPS plans, we'll try to include every detail we can and don't hesitate to leave a comment!

HA Elastic CPU, Outreach and use spare CPU resources if you max out your own!

First off The plans on offer!:
Location: ***Toronto, Canada***

>1vCPU | 512MB RAM (879MB SWAP)|20GB SSD| 10Mbps Unlimited Transfer = 3.80/Month or $0.0057/hr


----------
>1vCPU | 512MB RAM (879MB SWAP)|20GB SSD| 100Mbps Unlimited Transfer =  5.70/Month or $0.008/hr

Test IP: 198.144.155.27 (Ping/Tracert)

Operating Systems Available:
Full Root Access!
 - Windows 2008
 - CentOS 6 / CentOS 5
 - Debian 7
 - Ubuntu 12
 - rhel 6 / rhel 5
